mapper.select: select * from alarm where target_no = #{target_no} order by content_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into alarm values ( alarm_seq.nextval, #{target_no}, #{pusher_no}, #{content_no}, #{content_type}, #{content_play}, #{content_state}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete alarm where target_no = #{target_no} and pusher_no = #{pusher_no} and content_no = #{content_no} and content_type = #{content_type} and content_play = #{content_play}
